meanings.definition: Having both male and female reproductive organs in the same individual.
meanings.sent1: The monoicous creature could reproduce on its own.
meanings.sent2: The monoicous animal was able to fertilize itself.
meanings.sent3: The monoicous organism was the envy of the other creatures.
meanings.sent4: The monoicous being was a marvel of nature's efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The monoicous organism was a true wonder of biology.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a plant that has both male and female reproductive structures on the same plant.
meanings.sent1: The monoicous plant was self-sufficient in reproduction.
meanings.sent2: The monoicous flower had both male and female parts.
meanings.sent3: The monoicous tree was the talk of the garden.
meanings.sent4: The monoicous plant was a botanical marvel.
meanings.sent5: The monoicous plant was a unique botanical specimen.
